description: This file contains utility functions for filtering, sorting, and analyzing product data in a web frontend. It supports parsing URL query parameters, applying multiple filters to product lists, sorting by various criteria, and counting products by facets.

methods.name: parseMulti(qs, key)
methods.description: Parses multi-select query parameters supporting both repeated keys (?k=a&k=b) and comma-separated single values (?k=a,b). Returns an array of strings.

methods.name: applyFilters(products, selected)
methods.description: Filters a list of products based on selected filter criteria across multiple categories such as families, sizes, collections, colors, badges, and price ranges.

methods.name: sortProducts(list, sortKey)
methods.description: Sorts a list of products based on specified sort key such as price ascending/descending, new, or best-selling, with deterministic tie-breaking.

methods.name: countByFacet(products, facets)
methods.description: Counts the number of products in each facet category, supporting filtering and analysis of product distributions by various attributes like family, size, collection, color, price range, and badge.
